lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to help someone who needs a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I was a secretary in several different companies. I was also an accountant in a bank. I lived on a farm for many years with my late husband and am happy to be retired and living in a small community in Washington State.

lender.occupational_info: i dont work yet, i go to school. i go to classes every day and do homework when i get home.

lender.name: Sue
lender.occupation: better world scout & CBC radio tech columnist
lender.loan_because: I believe that planting many seeds of uplift in small and meaningful ways produces sustainable community harvests. Micro-lending is the most direct and personal form of uplift and has the capacity for constant renewal.
lender.occupational_info: Community technology strategist and radio columnist by day, better world scout by heart. I'm a connector and bridge builder with two willing hands.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I am also an entrepreneur and want to help others who are working hard to support their family. It takes so little to help so much.

lender.name: Bandegolus/DRRGLPAD

lender.name: The Giving Tree
lender.loan_because:
We want to give people a chance to become self-sufficient and live an honourable life.
We believe that a hand up is better than a hand out, and that it needs to be both transparent and accountable.
We believe that planting many seeds of uplift in small and meaningful ways helps people become self-sustaining and strengthens both the economic and social fabric of communities. Micro-lending is the most direct and personal form of uplift and has the capacity for constant renewal.
lender.occupational_info:
The Giving Tree is not one person, but many.
This started out as a personal account in which I reinvested some of the gifts that had been given to me through my online business. I have been content creator in the Second Life online community for 6 years, and began investing a percentage of my sales income into people through microloans through a few online projects.
In 2008 I began inviting customers and friends to join me in creating a little uplift here at Kiva, which resulted in investing in the first 50 entrepreneurs during the first year.
While I am leaving Second Life to pursue new opportunities, the money invested here will continue to be paid forward to other entrepreneurs.
Namaste, Sue.

lender.name: Schultz
lender.loan_because: I enjoy contributing to someone's dream of owning/operating their own business. It's all about helping each other at the end of the day....
lender.occupational_info: Risk mitigation/crisis management for a financial institution. I also run a small business on Ebay selling handbags and other accessories.

lender.name: justine
lender.loan_because: I have seen extreme poverty and just want to help a little. I wish I could do more.
lender.occupational_info: I'm sure what I do daily wouldn't even seem like work to any of you!!!

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I can. In the last year, I've had the opportunity to travel to various places in Southeast Asia. I've seen so much beauty in all the countries I've been to but I've also seen so much poverty. Its hard to just be a tourist and not make more of a difference to the people living there. I ask myself...is there anything I can do besides being a tourist in these places? Is there something I can do even if I only have little money to offer. I'm hopeful that this is part of the answer :-)

lender.name: Gar
lender.loan_because: Luck played a large part in me being able to live as I do. Talent and ambition should be encouraged and nourished regardless of circumstance.

lender.name: TheBikeLife
lender.loan_because:
we do not get to choose our situation at birth, but we can work with what we are provided.
Improvements in the standard of living - especially in DVC's - fundamentally rests on increases in productivity via improved physical capital, better methodologies and technologies, or investment into human capital such as education and training. Yet, its a chicken and the egg problem: To improve financial well-being one must make these investments, but to make these investments one must have the financing.
While avoiding many of the debilitating complexities of foreign aid, Kiva is an amazing solution to this dilemma! It establishes the market required for microfinancing to prosper and provides the financial resources vital for improving the standard of living. These resources provide the opportunity for the receiving individuals to fund the investment they truly need for establishing long-term gains - for their family, for their community, and for their country. More often than not, they are good hard-working people that simply need to be given an opportunity...
We do not get to choose our situation at birth, but we can work with what we are provided. Let's provide them with that opportunity.

lender.name: JD B
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the stories and hard work of the entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info:
I help to measure and communicate the effectiveness of Kiva Field Partners in achieving their social mission.
Twitter @jdbergeron

lender.name: Jenn
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate to have the means to share with others!
lender.occupational_info: Business Owner: Skin Care and Wellness

lender.name: Stacy & Scott
lender.loan_because: Of the age old cliche, everybody deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: We mold the minds of the young.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: To applaud their efforts and show that am cheering for their success.

lender.name: Stewby
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who may not have the opportunity to get out of poverty were it not for microcredit, and because I live in a hugely privileged part of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in educational video as well as making short films. I am also a photographer, with a particular interest in live music photography.

lender.name: InSite Yoga
lender.loan_because: Our mission is to help individuals and communities progress toward the fullest expression of their potential. Lending through Kiva is one way in which can fulfill our purpose and extend our support to entrepreneurs and organizations around the world. It is also one of the ways we take our yoga practice 'off the mat and into the world'. So, in the spirit of generosity, compassion, and inner freedom we are thrilled to be a part of the Kiva community and give loans that change lives.
lender.occupational_info: InSite Yoga is a mobile wellness company that develops educational programs and services that help individuals and communities access the well-documented benefits of yoga and progress toward the fullest expression of their potential.

lender.name: Mark & Miya
lender.loan_because: it helps to improve lives, and inspires others to do so also. This is a great place to start. Thanks goes to Kiva, and all within it for reaching out to those in need.
lender.occupational_info:
> MARK is a financial trader, and financial risk management consultant, assisting others to clarify, simplify and work with more focus in their trading.
His wife: > MIYA works in a community-based organization, helping poor children and their families to work to achieve transformational development.

lender.occupational_info: I make computers see.

lender.name: Amina & Tomas
lender.loan_because: I like the feeling of being able to help somebody else live a fruitful and happy life.

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can to help shift the current economic systems and reward models.
lender.occupational_info: Helping young adults realize their leadership potential around living and creating an environmentally sustainable, socially just, and spiritually fulfilling world.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I realize the incredible advantages that I have been given in my life because I was born into a wealthy American family. I feel that the best way for me to make use of these advantages is to do what I can to help those who are far less fortunate than I.
lender.occupational_info: I am an undergraduate Politics major who is focusing on Global Development and Health Policy. When I graduate, I hope to found an NGO that promotes American involvement in the development of the underdeveloped world.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: Karma

lender.name: Tomi
lender.loan_because: There is no reason why I shouldn`t...

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help others, particularly to help others help themselves. And I feel so fortunate that it only makes sense to share some of that. It is great to be able to share with people from around the world, making the world a smaller place.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home with 2 little boys. I used to be a teacher of mathematics, and will probably return when my boys are older.

lender.name: HULUNICON
lender.occupation: WHOLESALE DURABLE / NON-DURABLE GOODS AND SERVICES
lender.loan_because: I am investing, because others gave me the opportunities to succeed in business and I am just giving back so that others can succeed as well.
lender.occupational_info: HULLUM UNITED CONSTELLATION, INC. is a Southern California-based INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY MANAGEMENT, WHOLSALE DISTRIBUTION & BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE Company, headquartered in San Diego, California, engaged in Sales and Service within the United States of America and worldwide.

lender.name: Mothers of Preschoolers
lender.loan_because: we want to help other mothers across the world to become stronger financially, emotionally and spiritually.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of mothers that meet for fellowship, crafts, and prayer on a weekly basis

lender.name: garvie
lender.loan_because: i can appreciate what it's like to be a person with a worthwhile business idea which no bank is willing to fund.
lender.occupational_info: i am designing kiosks to place in the Second Life virtual world which will connect SL residents to the Kiva website. this will increase awareness of Kiva.org and allow SL residents to make loans in world.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: Everyone is responsible for doing their part, no matter how small, to better the world we live in. Microfinancing has a proven track record for helping the poor by directly benefiting those who need it most.

lender.name: Ricky
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help people and am interested in business being performed in different parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I make decisions on whether or not to give loans to a person based upon credit information.

lender.name: Turker
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great program. I like being able to help folks take charge of their future.
lender.occupational_info: I have a great shopping website that gives folks the best price and also gives them bonus points to redeme for goods.

lender.name: World Action Group
lender.loan_because: We believe that we can change the world one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: We unite and help our local community to help unite the world.

lender.name: Chimu Adventures
lender.loan_because: We see the need for us to give back to the communities that we operate in.
lender.occupational_info: We try hard to support a range of different charities and NGO's through responsible tourism.

lender.name: Greg & Kathy
lender.occupational_info: Kathy is a homemaker who loves to be creative with quilting and knitting.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: Life has been good to me. This is an opportunity to give back.

lender.name: Thierry
lender.loan_because:
I wholeheartedly believe in the principles behind micro-finance and Kiva.
People are fundamentally well intentioned and able. It's often the situation and context in which they live that impacts their ability to lead a fulfilling life and reach their dreams. Lending through Kiva, levels the playing field.
People get satisfaction in achieving their goals and meeting their own needs and Kiva certainly helps in that regard. But I also think Kiva helps the more fortunate ones among us get perspective and by making it easy for us to help out, makes us feel good too.
I loan because helping someone in need makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I help people start companies and come-up with ways to sell their products.

lender.name: Jeni
lender.loan_because: I want to empower others

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate in my life, with others helping me in my studies and profession. I would like to return the favor to others.
lender.occupational_info: I help children and grownups with worries that they don't understand and which make it difficult for them to enjoy their lives.

lender.name: Michael & Penny
lender.loan_because: People have loaned money to us and we are paying it forward in our own small way.
lender.occupational_info: We have an online recruiting company where we help people all over the world find jobs in the Consumer Packaged Goods industry.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I want to assist those who wish to improve their lives.

lender.name: Quay & Lucky
lender.loan_because: Giving a helping hand

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: My son got a gift certificate for his birthday. He just passed away on April 19, 2008. I wanted to loan in his memory to someone his age who needed help
lender.occupational_info: I help people get resources they need and encourage them to see their strengths so they can improve their lives.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good. I like to know that my money is helping somebody greatly improve their quality of life.

lender.name: Dave & Michele
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed by God and want to give back to others.
lender.occupational_info: I build utility size wind turbines

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student.

lender.name: Michael and Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people realize their goals and be able to create a meaningful life.

lender.name: Toby & Denise
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the metal business and have a soft spot for others in the same field.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: There have been critical times in my life when people reached out to help me; without asking or accepting anything in return. I wasn't able to pay them back, so I will pay them forward, instead.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people who have mental and physical disabilities to maintain their daily lives.

lender.name: Cory
lender.loan_because: it's what Jesus taught me to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Spring Arbor University. My major is mathematics.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: To whom much has been given, much has been required.
lender.occupational_info: I sell books on the internet.

lender.name: Katarina
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. My parents were able to suceed in the US because someone believed in them and gave them a loan to buy real estate because no one would rent to a family of 11. They were able to repay all their debt in a few years and are now living the American dream!
lender.occupational_info: I act as an advisor for a specific business line within a US bank.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of microfinance. It is something that I can do to make my world a better place. I believe I was very blessed to be born into the circumstances that I have and want to share them with others who are less fortunate. When we enrich the lives of those around us or even across the globe the world becomes a better place, a place of love, a place of compassion, a place of hope, a place of positive energy and spirit. It gives me great satisfaction to be a part of such an endeavor.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a registered nurse primarily in a drug and alcohol treatment center as well as all over the hospital. I love serving others and helping them to find peace in a world where little is offered elsewhere. I treat their physical symptoms as well as their emotional, spiritual, and mental symptoms to help them to find this peace. A smile and a word from someone who cares can make all the difference in someone's day.

lender.name: Rob & Lisa
lender.loan_because: We want to help.
lender.occupational_info: We are currently college students, but we will be graduating soon.

lender.name: Kim & Molly
lender.loan_because: It's a great thing to do and so many need a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: We have a Christmas tree farm and a big garden that we grow many vegetables.

lender.name: Rheana
lender.loan_because: I believe in karma.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pre-medicine student. I look forward to living life as a physician and providing healthcare to people globally.

lender.name: Georgiana
lender.loan_because: I love all the great ideas people have to start wonderful new businesses and want to be a part of it!

lender.name: IN MEMORY OF PER IMSLAND
lender.occupation: IN MEMORY OF MY FATHER PER IMSLAND
lender.loan_because:
IN MEMORY OF PER IMSLAND
This account is established in memory of my father, Per Imsland, born June 1931 and died April 2008 in Stavanger, Norway.
My father was born in Stavanger on June 12, 1931, the only child of Nacor and Aslaug Imsland. At an early age he began working in his fatherâ€™s butcher shop, where he continued working during his Engineering studies at Kongsgaard College in Stavanger. Early on he showed his great entrepreneurship, and in the course of his life he helped start many businesses, and also had his own business. He married my mother, Haldis Espedal, in 1956. I was born in 1958 and my brother in 1963. He always encouraged my brother and me to do our best and see the opportunities that lay in front of us. Because of him and my mother, my brother and I have our own businesses today and are doing well because of what they taught us.
I want his spirit of giving and encouragement to go on living through this KIVA account, helping other people who are not as fortunate as us, making it possible for them to start and continue having a business that takes care of them and their families.
Sissel Imsland Bridges Michigan, USA. Sissely@aol.com

lender.name: Bunny
lender.loan_because: I respect the entrepreneurs who work so hard to make a living. A little of my money can make a much bigger difference in another country than it can where I live.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I heard about Kiva through Bill Clinton's book Giving: How Each of Us Can Change the World.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a cell biologist at the University of Texas at Dallas, School of Behavioral and Brain Sciences.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: now I can-- it's accessible, easy, and I can see how my small loan (combined with others) are helping to change lives. Microlending is an amazing way to give the power and freedom back to people instead of initiating top-down oppressive approaches that leave the deicion-making to westerners.
lender.occupational_info: I help working people achieve their dreams here in America. When people unite, they have power-- just like the microloans help a group of people achieve their dreams- the labor union helps working people receive a fair wage and the respect that each human deserves in the workplace.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to become a better steward of what God's given me, and a way to be a partner of what He is doing all over the world. Rather cool, don't you think?

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I feel guilty for having it so easy, and because I'm sorry for all the damage Americans have caused worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: i try to live as simply as I can, scavenge and repair and recycle tools, machinery,etc.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I love to see how the money multiplies itself, so I can lend to more and more people...my original deposit has morphed into 10 times as much in loans over the years! Now, THAT'S recycling... ;-)
lender.occupational_info: A bit of a "mad scientist"...I make special custom medications "from scratch", in situations where mass-manufactured drugs are inappropriate (eg: making a heart medicine tablet into a flavored liquid for a baby, or making a medicine into a gel which can be rubbed on the skin instead of swallowed...).

lender.name: Krish
lender.loan_because: I want to remove the poverty wall one brick at a time.

lender.name: Murugan
lender.loan_because: I would like to have a seed money to expand my NGO activities.This loan will be very help to launch our endevours towards the rural people of india
lender.occupational_info: I am murugan,23, a graduate in engineering and social work,excutive member of an NGO Regency for Innovative Social Change in India based at Dindigul,Tamilnadu,India and social innovator.

lender.name: Stevers
lender.loan_because: All that I have on this Earth is on loan anyways.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: it's kewl
lender.occupational_info: i make video games and it owns.

lender.name: Gao, Wei
lender.loan_because: do more what I can do
lender.occupational_info: Give my support to other person.

lender.name: BRENDA
lender.loan_because: I was born in the USA and blessed with opportunity. I have seen the struggle of others. It is my desire to share my blessings with them.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired. I travel to the Dominican Republic several times a year. While there I volunteer in a school in a small village about 65 miles from the Haitian border.

lender.name: Yan
lender.loan_because: I am acutally living in San Jose and I am going back to China on a project to help chinese especially rural migrant workers to be able to have a little bit better life and possible help them to get access to information and get start in business such as a small photo shop,. a hand craft etc. I know reliable people but I don't have enough money to fund them.
lender.occupational_info: I am China's CPA and US CPA candidate, before I left my job I work as Sarbanes Oxley consultant. So I will be your ambassador to the poor place and validate the business plan for your money and your love for less fortunated people.

lender.name: Rene
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Run a webshop.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I have been introduced to micro finance by a great person already active in the non-profit space, sitting at the board of One Acre Fund. And I want to take a more active role in supporting the efforts of those who try to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently working on a new project after I spent almost 4 years working in commodities trading and recycling. This project is focused on promoting new clean tech in the metal scrap recycling, in order to reduce the environmental footprint of that type of recycling, while keeping a sound and improved business model.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I want to see it work, and make a direct impact.
lender.occupational_info: I work with charities who fundraise to help make the world a better place, through my company Pareto Works.

lender.name: maria
lender.whereabouts: vila nova gaia vila nova gaia

lender.name: Christiana
lender.loan_because: I want to see a better and fairer world. Seeing people seeking and giving loans at Kiva give me hope that the world can be a better place for us all. It makes me happy to be a small part of that.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help charities all around the work to do brilliant and effective fundraising that helps their beneficiaries. Check out our website

lender.name: Thinkgroup
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of mothers who meet weekly to talk about things other than children and to exercise our brains and creativity. We aim to raise funds to lend to people less well off than us through Kiva, and the money they pay back will go directly to another person through Kiva.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to and believe that those who are in that position have an obligation to help out those who are not.
lender.occupational_info: i coordinate daily construction activities in the field among different trades in order to deliver a successful project.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to do it.
lender.occupational_info: I work with others to develop projects that will help people with disabilities be able to live & work in their communities more freely.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.occupational_info: I work with schools to help students

lender.name: beaver and glen
lender.loan_because: JAMES 1:27 Religion that god our father accepts as pure and faultess is this : To look after orphans and widows in there distress and to keep oneself from being polluted by the world.
lender.occupational_info: God has been generous to us,so we want to be generous with our brothers and sisters in need around the world and at home.

lender.name: Sabine
lender.loan_because: we live together in this world.

lender.name: Christian & Christofer
lender.loan_because: We want to help some people around the world.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I can....
lender.occupational_info: I make movies

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I plan meetings, instructional gatherings, and assist teachers in performing their jobs at a college.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I can! Microlending is an idea whose time has come. Let's stop poverty! To help someone who needs it and wants it, how could I not loan? Their lives are improved and I get to feel good about myself while brushing up on my geography!

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: My friends Adam & Melissa gave me a Kiva gift certificate for my birthday-- what a great present! I hope to be able to pass the money back and forth around the world to help out some good people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a playwright (which has so far earned me $0... hey, I could use a loan, too!) and work at an office as an assistant during the day.

lender.name: Spencer
lender.loan_because: I believe that institutional organizations will never succeed in ameliorating world poverty. If we want to see economic growth in severely disadvantaged areas, we will have to make it happen ourselves.

lender.name: Esther
lender.loan_because: Giving to people makes life more satisfying. As I tell my kids, we are privileged to live in the U.S., we are obliged to help others as much as we can. No matter how we struggle, there is always someone who is struggling more.
lender.occupational_info: I use computers to create designs that will be printed or put on the web. I also make wedding movies for people using vintage super 8mm film and cameras.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much in my short life. Life isn't all about me. We are all in this together and any difference I can make by giving helps me live out why I am on this earth!
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school and junior high school students, counsel and train parents and help families learn to love each other and love others.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I have been alawyer for 22 years. For seventeen of those years I have been a publice defender, representing court appointed clients in felony, misdemeanor and juvenile deliquency cases. I just recently moved to Legal Aid, the civil side of legally aiding those of poverty level and seniors at most any financial level.

lender.name: cindy
lender.loan_because: I like making a difference and helping people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people sell their house and buy a new house. I handle all the legal aspects of trading real property

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: Because I have the means to do so, and I believe in paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a group of people who sell and service very large tires used in the Mining Industry. My role is to ensure they have what they need to be safe in their work and unsure the long term viability of their jobs. We are physically located in the Alberta Oil Sands region of Fort McMurray.

lender.name: Ed & Barbara
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed so we wish to Share God's wonderful blessing with others.
lender.occupational_info: Since retirement we now have a small seasonal vacation rental where we live.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I love that I can be a part of helping people help themselves if given half a chance.

lender.name: Francis Parker Service
lender.loan_because: it fosters an understanding of global interconnectedness among our students.

lender.name: Marcin
lender.loan_because: I like to make a difference :)

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I try to tell a good story

lender.name: Wayne+Helen
lender.loan_because: This will make the world a better place!
lender.occupational_info: Wayne was a farmer and heavy equipment operator. Helen moved freight around the world and worked with the international banking system.

lender.name: Markwin and Frances
lender.loan_because: We want to give unfortunate people a chance to have a better life. To help in the fight against poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Husband works with wood in an industrial setting. He helps to make and distribute cabinetry, tables, desks, and bedroom furniture. Wife is a hair stylist.

lender.name: AThu
lender.loan_because: .....you don't have to be a millionaire to change the lives of others...

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to have a good, secure job and I want to help less fortunate people be able to achieve their dreams of a thriving business.
lender.occupational_info: I am a firefighter in a city in Connecticut. We respond to fires, medical calls, car accidents, water rescues, chemical spills, and technical rescue incidents.

lender.name: Ann Marie
lender.loan_because: Ann Marie, you have been such a wonderful mentor to me over the past year. This donation is being made in your honor as a thank you!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I am a believer that we need to spread our wealth in this country to help others throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office in Manhattan for a non profit organization. Sort of like Kiva.

lender.name: Paloma
lender.loan_because: I am happy to be of help to someone
lender.occupational_info: I help people market their business or service

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that needs help, I had a time when I needed help and I had it, now its my turn to help.
lender.occupational_info: I color and cut peoples hair and make them happy!!

lender.name: Caleb
lender.loan_because: I love millie.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of kiva.

lender.name: C&J BeeMoo
lender.loan_because: We really believe in micro-financing. A little bit can benefit greatly to those who need it.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because:
Unfortunately this world is set up so that you need money to make more money. People of any class can only have a certain amount of upward mobility that depends on the resources available to them. The only things that can remove these boundaries are people who give of their resources in ways that the system does not promote.
Also, Jesus probably likes it...
lender.occupational_info: I am the director of a non-profit called "Global Neighborhood" that aims to build community and provide resources amongst/to refugees living here in Spokane, WA.

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: Not because I can, it's becasue it's the rigth thing to do.....
lender.occupational_info: Middle School Student (7th Grade)

lender.name: Shonn and Scott
lender.loan_because: We want to help.
lender.occupational_info: We help people.

lender.name: Armenak
lender.loan_because: I need three thousand dollars to pay my tuition to become a licensed psychologist.
lender.occupational_info: I work hard to do soothe mental wounds.

lender.name: Kortney
lender.loan_because: i want to help people live.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I have never had to worry what my family would eat the next day, and I feel an obligation to help those who have. I love this program because you can feel you are making a real difference - in a real personâ€™s life - even if your resources are limited. And youâ€™re not just giving them money to get them through one more day. Youâ€™re helping them to help themselves to better lives. Repayment of the loans gives them the opportunity to become a part of the cycle of helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I write web site copy for companies that have a product or service to sell. More importantly, I read, write fiction, mountain bike, hike, cook, drink wine, dance with my daughter, and sing along with my favorite music really loud when I'm by myself in my car.

lender.name: Lydia
lender.loan_because: I hope to make life a little bit easier

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: They can do more with this money than I can.
lender.occupational_info: I sit in a classroom and listen to people talk.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can... You can too! Feel free to join our team, The Garcia Family & Friends Foundation.
lender.occupational_info: I am the proud Dad of two Texas A&M Aggies, '05 and '11. I work in public service.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: it's my way of helping someone else less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the daily operations of a full service golf course clubhouse.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: It's a really personal way to make a difference.

lender.name: Lauren Linett
lender.loan_because: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, concerned citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has." Margaret Mead

lender.name: David & Virginia
lender.loan_because: We've been blessed beyond our needs and so many brothers and sisters around the world don't have means to meet their basic needs.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a large anatomic pathology laboratory that serves hospitals and patients in the Puget Sound region of NW Washington State in the USA.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the government in a legal office.

lender.name: Grechen
lender.loan_because: I have built a successful business and want others to have the opportunity to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I run a fashion/style/shopping website and empower women to dress for their bodies NOW to look their best.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: foolish idealism.
lender.occupational_info: I make coffee and sell bread

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: doing lots of small helpful things adds up quickly to something much greater.
